TopicTitle: 1800+m/s, 100% heating, sea level, stock, no exploits or cheats. Introducing the Meteor Mk10

Articles.Content:
Introducing the best plane I've ever made, the Meteor Mk10. At the title says, this little thing has some insane performance, AND it also has roughly 20 minutes of fuel and turns reasonably well at all speeds! It's a little unstable at full fuel, but that's one hell of a good compromise. It can even stay at 1800m/s for a good while before the wings melt!

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1868957207

See the steam workshop description for some instructions on handling.

Edited September 21, 2019 by Cannoneer_Mae
